title: AAVE Developer 1 (In Progress)
summary: This is a technical course for developers willing to write applications on AAVE.
highlights: Writing simple UI application on top of AAVE

topics.title: AAVE Smart Contracts
topics.details: This chapter taks about various important smart contracts of AAVE which forms the basis of lending and borrowing

questions.content: What is the main purpose of DeFi?
questions.explanation: Decentralised Finance is responsible for providing financial solutions for existing problems in the Centralized system using blockchain.

choices.content: Provide banking facilties only to high worth individuals
Providing Decentralized global financial solutions on blockchain
Trade and earn more using cryptocurrency
To provide centralized financial solutions on the blockchain

readings.title: Introduction to Decentralised Finance
readings.details:
This video enables learners to know about
  * Centralised banking system
  * DeFi components    
  * DEXs
  * DeFi advantages
